posts.post_content:
Hello all,

I would like to add a card from the 1800's to my collection.  Not looking for a HoFer or 'significant' card, just an example.  Condition is no issue.

Anyone got anything they would be willing to part with?

Dave

Hi Jerry, not sure what you mean by 'subjects', but I'll go ahead and say I prefer photos vs drawings and full body over portrait (would like to see the period equipment/uniforms).  

However, these are certainly not requirements for what I'm asking for in this thread.  Hope this helps, Dave
I sent a link to one of my N172s that meets your preferred criteria.
